ygData.messageBody:
Bard wrote:

> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
>
> <. I think most Bards would prefer to have this "bug" in the game>
> Why? When grouping with others it disrupts two of their most often used
> spells? I would think the opposite would be true. Granted, I can always
> get a SoW from someone in the group, but why let them waste the mana when
> Selo's is faster (at least for me)?
>

I think he's referring to the Selos dispells root bug, which is a *huge*
lifesafer for all in
my party. Ever been rooted in Unrest inches from the zone line while a carrion
ghoul and
his buddies beat you to death? I know I haven't, but its happened to my druid
friends
when we're not grouped. I'd scream bloody murder if they made Selos unable to
dispell
root. (Especially since I'm mostly playing on Rallos Zek these days - All those
naked
mages out for my blood, and no way to escape! :)

Lohengrin
-22nd level bard on Fennin Ro
-15th level bard on Rallos Zek
